segments.text: I see a woman in a dress, so focused on her chore that she seems to float in her own little bubble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she dries that plate almost looks meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the water pooling at her feet, a soft glimmer against the kitchen tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sheâ€™s completely unaware of the mess around her, and I can't help but feel a twinge of anxiety about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, contrasting sharply with this kitchen chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I watch the boy on the stool, his body stretched toward the cookie jar, and I can't believe how reckless he is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't he see how unstable that stool is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands there, practically vibrating with eagerness, her hand reaching up, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can two children get so involved in mischief while their mother is right there?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amusing and terrifying at the same time to witness their little conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR
